Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle FreedomTM Blood Glucose Monitoring System
FreeStyle Freedom™M Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle Freedom Blood Glucose Monitoring System utilizing coulometric biosensor for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood from various body sites to aid in monitoring diabetes control, for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes mellitus at home; not for diagnosis/screening of diabetes, neonates, or arterial blood.
